appinfo.about:
Wnmp 2.0.4 ********** - Wnmp Control Panel 2.0.9
* Wnmp now backups configuration files and overwrites the old ones. * Implemented Automatic Check For Updates Feature, see #15.
- Nginx
* Updated to 1.5.7
- MariaDB
* Updated to 5.5.34
